entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Kapuskasing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:11 p.m. EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.6Â°C

Observed at: Kapuskasing Airport 8:00 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

Visibility: 3 km

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
